titles.title: A resolution commending August Hiebert for his service to the Alaska Communications Industry.
A resolution commending August Hiebert for his service to the Alaska Communications Industry.

action.text: Submitted in the Senate and ordered held at desk.

vote.text: Resolution agreed to in Senate without amendment and with a preamble by Unanimous Consent.

bill.summary:
(This measure has not been amended since it was introduced. The summary of that version is repeated here.)
Commends Augie Hiebert (who founded Alaska's first television station and established Alaska's first FM radio station) for his service to the communications industry in Alaska and the world and for bringing the best of broadcasting to the Alaskan people.
